titleStmt.title: Iesus Maria Ioseph Teresia. The soul's delight composed by the R. F. Paul of St. Vbald, religious of the Holy Reformed Order, of the most Blessed Virgin. Mary, of the Mount Carmell, for the benefit of all deuout soul's but chiefely, of those that are giuen to mentall prayer, and are desirous of spirituall perfection
Jesus Maria Joseph Teresia. The soul's delight.
titleStmt.author: Teresa, of Avila, Saint, 1515-1582.
Paul, of St. Ubald, Brother.

publicationStmt.publisher: by William Lesteems in Hoochstrat at the signe of the Pellican,

notesStmt.note: Attribution from The third part of the soul's delight.
With an index and two final pages of errata.
Includes "The second part of the soul's delight, ..", which has separate title page, pagination, register, index, and errata.
Reproduction of the original at the Trininty College Library, Cambridge.

place.placeName: Hoochstrat at the signe of the Pellican
